name: Windows Network Enumeration
description: Identifies attempts to enumerate hosts in a network using the built-in Windows net.exe tool.
false_positives: Legitimate use of net.exe utility by legitimate user
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*view*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\\\\\*)))`
